Name: PLA
Label: Plasma
Definition: amount of drug found in plasma

Name: ULU
Label: Uninvolved Lung
Definition: amount of drug found in uninvolved lung (where there is no lesion).

Name: RIM
Label: Rim (of Lesion)
Definition: amount of drug found in Rim (of lesion)

Name: OCS
Label: Outer Caseum
Definition: amount of drug found in outer caseum

Name: ICS
Label: Inner Caseum
Definition: amount of drug found in inner caseum

Name: SLU
Label: Standard Lung
Definition: amount of drug found in standard lung (NO LESION)

Name: SLE
Label: Standard Lesion
Definition: amount of drug found in standard lesion (NO LUNG)

Name: huPPB
Label: Human Plasma Binding
Definition: The fraction of drug concentration that binds to human plasma proteins

Name: muPPB
Label: Mouse Plasma Binding
Definition: the fraction of drug concentration that binds to mouse plasma proteins

Name: MIC_Erdman
Label: MIC Erdman Strain
Definition: Minimum Inhibitory Concentration of Erdman strain

Name: MICserumErd
Label: MIC Erdman Strain with Serum
Definition: Min. Inhibitory Conc. of Erdman Strain w/ serum added

Name: MIC_Rv
Label: MIC Rv Strain
Definition: MIC for H37Rv strain of M. tuberculosis.

Name: Caseum_binding
Label: Caseum Binding
Definition: fraction of drug conc. bound to the constituents of the caseum (% unbound)

Name: MacUptake
Label: Macrophage Uptake (Ratio)
Definition: rate of uptake of drug molecules by macrophages

Name: dose_int
Label: Dosage Interval
Definition: When the dose is adminstered (QD vs BID)

Name: level
Label: Level of Drug
Definition: The level the drug was measured (Cmax or Trough)
